articles.author: Sam Clark, Victor Jack
articles.title: Baltics brace for cyberattacks as they depart Russian electricity grid - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: A long-planned exit from the BRELL power grid has the Baltic countries preparing for Russian retaliation.
articles.content: His agency has advised energy companies on how to prepare and has experts on hand 24/7 in case of a serious incident, Auväärt said, adding Estonia is working with Latvia and Lithuania on the threat.… [+1383 chars]
